articles.title: Should medical leave affect how we're evaluated at work?
articles.content: I remember this conversation I had almost a decade ago with a dedicated employee. "I didn't mean to fall sick," she protested. I agreed, but given her attendance record, I kept that score while highlighting other ways she had contributed positively. For me, showing up mattered. One could argue that medical leave is an entitlement, even when all days are used. Such was a sentiment that recently surfaced in a Singapore Reddit forum discussion on fully utilising sick leave.

articles.title: Nestle, Dumex infant formula products recalled over presence of toxin
articles.content: The affected products are from Nestle and Dumex. "SFA has detected cereulide toxin in two additional formula products. SFA also assured the public that Singapore continues to have a diversity of infant formula products.
